name: Godot Challenges
description:
2D Plat-formerKeyboard Controls

AD or The Left and Right Arrow Keys for left and right

W, Space or Up Keys for Jump

S for ground pound

R for reset

and

Shift for dash

Controller Controls

Left and Right on the left joystick for left and right

A or X for Jump

Down on the left joystick for ground pound

and

B or Circle  for dash
